text: Hum ney aap say pehlay jiss rasool aur nabi ko bheja uss kay sath yeh hua kay jab woh apnay dil mein koi aarzoo kerney laga shetan ney uss ki aarzoo mein kuch mila diya pus shetan ki milawat ko Allah Taalaa door ker deta hai phir apni baten pakki ker deta hai. Allah Taalaa dana aur ba-hikmat hai
